DOC.brief_summary: This parallel , assessor blind , placebo-controlled , stratified , randomize study investigate effect everyday pain cognition mobility otherwise healthy individual .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study Investigate Cognition Function Mobility Individuals With Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study also evaluate relationship specific type intensity everyday pain cognitive function mobility . Finally , potential effect intervention paracetamol paracetamol caffeine cognitive function mobility also study exploratory basis .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Demonstrates understand study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . Aged 1865 year . Participant male female . Understands willing , able likely comply study procedure restriction . Adequately complete cognition mobility familiarisation task opinion investigator . Good general mental health , opinion investigator medically qualify designee : No clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history upon physical examination ; absence condition might impact participant 's safety wellbeing affect individual 's ability understand follow study procedures requirement ; BMI > 18.5 < 30 kg/m2 VISIT 1 ONLY Has experience minimum two recurrent , acute pain episode within past 3 month currently suffer flare episode recurrent , acute pain ; VISIT 2 ONLY A score ≥5 question 6 ( rat scale 010 ) Brief Pain Inventory Short Form participant present one follow pain type : Joint ( Knee , Hip ) ; Back ; Headache ; Period . Exclusion Criteria Women pregnant ( Visit 1 ) , woman child bear potential test positive urine pregnancy test ( Visit 1 Visit 2 ) , females nonchild bear potential required complete urinary pregnancy test , postmenopausal female require pregnancy test define : Age ≥ 50 year spontaneous cessation menses 12 month age < 55 year spontaneous menses within past 1 year , currently amenorrheic . Women currently breastfeed . In opinion medical designee , participant suffers medical condition ( ) may aggravate due test procedure may impact interpretation integrity data . Conditions related renal , hepatic , respiratory , blood , immune system heart dysfunction consider . Participant colour blind . Current ( within 14 day start study ) regular use prescription , overthecounter ( OTC ) , herbal medicine unless medication approve study physician . OTC analgesic pain relief vitamin supplement permit 48 hour prior study visit ; Current 30 day prior dose use drug , food , herbal product , dietary supplement know induce inhibit hepatic drug metabolism ( e.g . barbiturate , theophylline , cimetidine , erythromycin ) ; Use analgesic antiinflammatory drug 48 hour prior dose Visit 2 ; Known take medication could counteract paracetamol and/or caffeine ; Current past use antidepressant psychoactive drug within previous 2years . Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material ( closely relate compound ) state ingredient . Positive breath alcohol test Visit 2 positive urine drug abuse test Visit 2 . Participation another clinical study ( include cosmetic study ) receipt investigational product within 7 day screen visit previous participation randomization study . Participant excessive frequent caffeine intake equivalent 6 cup brew coffee 12 cup tea per day ; Unwilling abstain caffeine product 4 hour prior visit assessment day ( Visit 2 3 ) ; Current Smoker ( regular nicotine consumption ) : Participant smoke 3 cigarette per day ( equivalent ecigarettes , chew tobacco pipe ) . Investigator ensure impact withdrawal effect nicotine dependence ; Current Alcohol Consumer : Participant consumes great 21 unit alcohol per week ( male ) 14 unit per week ( female ) ( e.g . Spirit 25ml = 1 unit / AlcoPop 275ml = 1.5 unit / Bottle beer 330 ml = 1.7 unit / Glass wine 175ml = 2.1 unit / Pint beer 568 ml = 3 unit ) . Members study site staff member immediate family . Any participant opinion investigator take part study .
